subproject.corporate outcome: Support national public administration reform initiatives
subproject.description:
1.1 Monitoring &Evaluation system and indicators for Public Administration Reform designed, piloted for putting into regular use later on.
1.2 Public Administration Reform Master Programme 2001-2010 reviewed and Public Administration Reform Master Programme for the next period (i.e 2011-2020) oriented.
2.1 New public service delivery models developed and piloted in education, health and culture.
2.2 Quality of public administrative service delivery  provided by district government and one stop shop improved.
3.1 Support the pilot non-establishment of people's councils at district and ward level.
3.2 Support the study on improving the role and responsibility of local administrative body head.
4.1 Result based Public Administration Reform partnership, cooperation and communication.
4.2 An information system on Public Administration Reform is upgraded and put into use.
subproject.title: Public Administration Reform
